title: Heuristic Internet Information Education Design for Medical Students

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: A faculty competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers. Practice-oriented education to strengthen online medical data search and evaluation skills. Conducts pre- and post-assessments using online survey tools

learning_goals: Learners can extract core information from medical English web resources with 80% accuracy.
Learners can evaluate reliable medical information sources using a 4-step heuristic criteria (authority, recency, evidence, objectivity).
Learners can summarize and analyze medical abstracts within 15 minutes and explain their clinical implications.
Learners can locate more than three evidence-based resources related to a specific disease within 20 minutes using online search strategies.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
